ygData.subject: Re: Spell relations
ygData.msgSnippet: I know of one site and one document desribing what you are looking for. Xornn s site has more information that I found usefull, but both are great references.
ygData.messageBody:
I know of one site and one document desribing what you are looking for.
Xornn's site has more information that I found usefull, but both are great
references.

Xornn's Guild to Enchanting:
http://members.tripod.com/xornn/

The Lazy Enchanters Guide to Being an Enchanter (follow the link on the page)
http://www.knightsofluclin.org/download.php?op=viewdownload&cid=2

Couzan Talismanic
49th Level Enchanter

Date: Wed, 25 Jul 2001 15:50:37 +0100
From: Tommy MacDonald <casp@...>
Subject: Spell relations

Hi,
does anyone have a guide/know of a website which lists spells and their
relations?
For example "Mesmerize > Enthrall > Mesmerization > Entrance".... it'd just
be useful to know which spells are upgrades of other spells... this is
semi related to an earlier post I made :o)
I'm sort of thinking about setting up a website with cross-references for
all the spell lists... so you have one page with them listed by lvl,
another with them listed by relation (as above), another with them listed
by their outcome (ie a list of stun spells, buffs, debuffs etc). This may
have already been done... if anyone knows of such a site, please let me know?
Thanks :o)

--
Tommy MacDonald ~ ICQ: 1532951
